import react ,{useState} from "react"; import "./LoginForm.css"; const LoginForm = () => { const [NameItem , setNameItem] = useState(" "); const [SurnameItem , setSurnameItem] = useState(" "); const [Items,SetItems]=useState const AddItem = () => { console.log(NameItem + SurnameItem) } return (
setNameItem(e.target.value)} type="text"/> setSurnameItem(e.target.value)} className="form-control my-2" type="text"/>
) } export default LoginForm
